story:
Short Summary

It was 2012 when part of our team reached Morocco for the first time. We were looking for ancient mines but wat we found was Aouam, its fortress and its huge mine, exploited from pre-historic times till now. We found a forgotten place that needs to be re-discovered and promoted, but no-one can do this without involving local dweller.

In 2014, we came back to Aouam and started working. We made a preliminary digging and we worked closely with local institutions and associations, that asked us to create a museum to help promoting their land: they want this museum to tell the long story of Aouam and Tighza from pre-historic exploitation to modern times. But there is a second aim to create this archaeo-mining museum: the population of Aouam and Tighza, always connected to the mine since the beginning of their history, are now suffering major occupational crisis connected to economic and social problems. This is why the new museum will be not only a new way to link people to their homeland and history, but also the engine for a true re-birth.

Inside the museum, thanks to education courses and didactic laboratories, unemployed young people and kids will learn everything they need to manage and take care of the museum, starting from French and everyday conservation of the objects, in order to work together to promote the site to the major public, inside and outside Morocco. This is why the project will be strongly linked to local school, one of the first school of the area to accept both boys and girls. They will have the opportunity to learn, play and grow in and with the museum.

What We Need & What You Get

The AIM (Associazione integrazione e multicultura, by Brigitte Pargny), together with a mission of Italian CNR (lead by d. Lorenza Ilia Manfredi), will create the Eco-Museum for Aouam-Tighza (EMAT) to preserve local history and give a different future to dwellers. Mining company of Tighza (Compagnie Minière de Tiouissit), with the Association Abghour Puor le Developpement will leave us a building to set up the museum, ad least for the archaeological part. Laboratories and conference room will be inside the museum, while courses will be lead both here and in local schools.


What we need is furniture and tools. Our aim is to gain 5000€ to build some showcases for small artefacts, to write didactic panels in French, Arabic, Berber, to create teaching aids for the museum, such as 3D reconstructions of archaeological objects. But most of all we need to buy a couple of computers, a printer, paper, crayons, books to create a little library of history and archaeology, and everything we may need during our training courses and in laboratories for kids. All the money gained, whether we manage to reach the entire goal or not, will be used to buy basic tools for the museum.


The Impact

Everything will be bought by local factories, everything will be addressed to local people, in order to really help social development and economy of this part of Morocco.

  • Our team made something similar in past years in Algeria. AIM and CNR worked together in the most important Algerian cultural institutions, to train curators, tourist guides and restorers, who started working inside the museums. You can check what we did at cherchel-project.isma.cnr.it

  • But this time we need everything, we need people all over the world join together and help kids from Aouam and Tighza to have their own museum, help young people to have a different future, to help a whole community to get out the crisis, to help Morocco to have its first archaeo-mining museum.


Risks & Challenges

Our biggest problem is obviously the constant lack of money: if we don’t manage to gain money on our own, it is not possible to create the museum in the building Moroccan institutions gave us. We have to be the starting sparkle of this project, and if we won't be able to go there and do all the job we asked us to do, the Eco-Museum for Aouam and Tighza will be only a nice dream.

We applied to various calls for funding in Italy, Morocco, Europe, but the concurrence is big and our little community may not be strong enough to win. This is why we ask the whole world to help us!


Other Ways You Can Help

If it is no possible to you to give us concrete help, please share, get the word out, let the world know what we are doing here and what we need!

story:
Short Summary

Each year a team of Canada's top young scientists, innovators, entrepreneurs and researchers is selected to represent Canada on the international stage.

This year, a team of Canada's Top 12 youth will compete against the world from May 10th-15th at the 2015 Intel International Science & Engineering Fair (ISEF) in Pittsburgh, PA.

Meet this year's team. They are (left to right, top to bottom in photo):

Candace Brooks-Da Silva – Windsor, ON

A Biomimetic Non-Planar Approach to Reducing Induced Drag From Trailing Vortices

Emily Cross – Thunder Bay, ON

Patination of Raw Lithic Material for Analysis of Prehistoric Artifacts

Ben Friesen – Grimsby, ON

Improving Crypto; a Novel Smartphone Based Entropy Generator

Ann Makosinski – Victoria, BC

The e-Drink – Capturing Electricity From Beverages

Daniel McInnis – Ottawa, ON

Picture This: A Novel Approach to Limb Donor Matching, Prosthetic Design and Bone Allografts

Aditya Mohan – Ottawa, ON

Development Of A Novel Oncolytic Virus For Cancer Treatment And Diagnosis

Avinash Pandey – Waterloo, ON

Impact of Burst Exercise on Cardiometabolic Status of Newly Diagnosed Type 2 Diabetics

Janice Pang – Coquitlam, BC

miRNAs as biomarkers of IAPP-induced inflammation in type 2 diabetes

Amit Scheer – Ottawa, ON

Targeted Immunomodulatory Antigen-Adjuvant Nanoparticle: An Effective Therapeutic Cancer Vaccination

Duncan Stothers – Vancouver, BC

The FIRST Frame: Personalized Front Impact Reduction System for Bicycles

Nicole Ticea – Burnaby, BC

Point-of-Care Low-Cost Disposable Device for Nucleic Acid Testing of HIV: Sample-to-Answer in 60 Min

Raymond Wang – Vancouver, BC

Aircraft Cabin Airflow: Curbing Disease Transmission


As you can see from our 2011 Team Canada-ISEF video above, these are among some of the best science-minded youth in Canada!

Team Canada - ISEF is coordinated by Youth Science Canada, the nation's leading organization for promoting innovation and science & technology among Canadian youth for over 50 years, Youth Science Canada is very proud to represent and support Team Canada-ISEF. 

  • Every year, over 500,000 youth take up the challenge of creating a science project at schools across Canada.
  • 25,000 of those youth qualify to compete at one of over 100 regional fairs.
  • Of those 25,000, 500 earn the right to compete nationally at the Canada-Wide Science Fair.


What Your Support Enables


To compete at ISEF, three things are required: 1) a fabulous scientific project idea; 2) hours and hours of research and development to bring that project to life; 3) funding for travel, accommodation and registration fees.

It costs about $2,200 for each member of Team Canada-ISEF to be able to compete at this year's Intel ISEF in Pittsburgh. That breaks down to:

  • $750 each for flights
  • $700 each for accommodations
  • $270 each for food
  • $70 each for Team Canada hoodies and pins
  • $30 each for travel insurance

Additional costs include:

  • $2,100 for registration and affiliation fees
  • $400 to ship projects to the competition


The Impact

Your support will have a direct impact on the ability of these youth to compete on the world stage!

Team Canada ISEF 2014's twelve competitors earned 21 awards at ISEF including two First Awards. The 2015 include 6 ISEF veterans and we are excited by the level of work the team brings to this year's competition.

Past Team Canada members have gone to become world renowned researchers, successful entrepreneurs & innovators and some have even gone to become astronauts. Team Canada alumni include astronaut, Dr. Roberta Bondar and entrepreneur & inventor of the eco-friendly, electric-powered Uno, Ben Gulak. You can help inspire the next generation of great Canadian scientists to achieve these heights.


Other Ways You Can Help

Your support of Team Canada-ISEF is extremely appreciated. A financial contribution will go a long way to ensuring this year's student finalists can maintain their focus on representing Canada at ISEF.

If you are unable to make a donation, please consider promoting our page to your network of friends and family.

The students of Team Canada also welcome your encouragement and support. Please visit us at http://tc.youthscience.ca/

story:
CONTRIBUTE CREATIVELY!
YOU GET TO ENJOY THE FUN!

ART IS FOR EVERYONE!

Hello, my name is Gina Perry and I am the owner of Creative Clinic Center, based out of Grove City, Ohio.

Our goal is to bring an art education center to Grove City, Ohio by means of crowd funding so everyone can enjoy the benefits and just plain fun of being creative!

We currently travel to local venues to do our Paint Mixer events. (As we currently do not have an art center of our own.) These are extremely popular "social painting" events and draw in big crowds (mostly adults as cocktails are typically involved).

The community has expressed to me their desire for us to offer other classes such as:
  • Youth & Adult art classes
  • Art Camps
  • Foundation classes in drawing, figure drawing, still life, oil painting and more!
  • Gallery Shows
  • Creative Fundraiser Events! (way too much fun!!)
  •  We can even see performing arts, photography  and digital arts a possibility!

Having our own dedicated art center would allow us the freedom to expand in so many ways and benefit the community.

Here's what an art center can do for everyone:
  • Provide a space to conduct public & private creative events
  • Fundraisers
  • It would bring an added "attraction" and "fun/unique activities" to the area and neighboring towns
  • A gathering place to put those super cool Pinterest ideas to work!
  • Create more jobs and revenue (we've already hired a new art instructor)
  • Serve as a "supplement" to those who want to expand beyond their current art level or wonderful for those who have had art dropped from the schedule at school.

Art is VERY THERAPEUTIC! and today more than ever we need to find ways to "UNPLUG". Here is just a short list of the benefits:
  •  Inspires motivation and inventiveness
  •  Increases cognitive development
  •  Promotes relaxation
  •  Develops confidence
  •  Strengthens communication and problem solving skills
  •  Stimulates imagination
  •  Creates Out-of-the-Box thinking
  •  Even helps with memory and reduces anxiety for those with Alzheimer's, dementia, PTSD, depression, anxiety and lowers blood pressure.

Here is what your funds will go towards:
  • Rental or purchase of space for the center
  • Tables, chairs, easels
  • Art supplies
  • Lighting
  • Furniture
  • Remodeling
  • Signage
  • Marketing
  • Website improvements

So if this project gets you as EXCITED as we are, we ask you to fund this wonderful art center that will benefit the ENTIRE community and neighboring cities. Together, let's make this  exciting dream a reality for ALL OF US!

We hope to meet or "exceed our goal" and be in a new space inside of 2015!

BUT WAIT! We want to show our gratitude by offering come great PERKS to your for donating, such as discounts and free tickets to our events! Check them out!

A BIG THANK YOU to each person who took the time to watch our video, share this information with others and to those who donated! Together you all make a huge difference for us!

This venture means so much to us! Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!

Sincerely,
Gina Perry
Owner
Creative Clinic Center
www.creativecliniccenter.com
Grove City, Ohio

story:
Short Summary

Sunset Scholars is a community-oriented tutoring cooperative based in Sunset Park, Brooklyn. Sunset Scholars began because a social worker identified that her Spanish- and Chinese-speaking clients were lacking opportunity to receive tutoring from professionals. We aim to fill this gap by providing affordable tutoring for students in the local community.

We started this campaign to raise money for scholarships that we plan award to students at the beginning of the school year to use towards tutoring services at Sunset Scholars.

Your contributions will help students who would not be able to afford tutoring services get the help that they need to succeed academically. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $2500 dollars so that we can provide financial aid to 25 students who will receive $100 each in the form of scholarships to be used on tutoring services. We will begin accepting scholarship applications starting on Sunset Scholars' launch date of September 17th, 2015 and we plan to award scholarships in the beginning of October.

To express our gratitude for your generous support, we are offering many great perks, including e-thank you notes from the members of Sunset Scholars, student handwritten thank you notes, pencils, and t-shirts. We anticipate sending out perks by the end of October or early November.

The Impact

Sunset Park is home to many Spanish- and Chinese-speaking low-income immigrants. Your contributions will make tutoring more affordable for students who need it most so that they can start their academic year off on the right foot.

Risks & Challenges

We don't anticipate any substantial risks or challenges associated with this campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our mission and the work that we plan to do, please share this campaign with family, friends, coworkers and anyone else you can think of so that we can support students in getting the tutoring that they need.

story:
Victoria Cardozo, Miss Argentina 2015, aims to help the world in the Queen of the Universe Charity Pageant to support UNESCO & global education

Queen of the Universe unites the intelligence and beauty of woman around the world in search of the perfect ambassador of love, hope, and peace. The woman crowned "queen" will promote awareness to help the less privileged and will be a great ambassador of humanity and a role model for young women around the world.

The Queen of the Universe will promote education for children in need, and for children in third world countries, as well as work with various charities and nonprofits around the world.

  • The Mission: Queen of the Universe believes that by giving children a good education we empower them to become better human beings and make their dreams into a reality, therefore, making our next generations much stronger and more determined. We believe education is the most important thing you can give someone to better their circumstances.
  • Charitable Alliance: UNESCO is the United nations Education Science and Cultural Organization. Queen of the Universe highly believes in the UNESCO motto, "Teach a child how to fish, and you'll feed him his entire life."
  • All funds will go directly to UNESCO!
Now who is Victoria?

I'm a Los Angeles based actress who also believes in helping those in need as well. I'm passionate about what I do and I love helping others in anyway I can. I came to become Miss Argentina because both my parents are from Argentina and I become eligible to compete in the Queen of the Universe Pageant.  For the Queen of the Universe pageant, you either have to be born in the country you represent or have blood from it. 

Why do I believe this is important?

I believe we are put on this planet to create, inspire, and help those who are not as fortunate as us. It's important to have human compassion and to try to bring love and encouragement to others in need and to help them find, get and accomplish their own dreams.  If I am crowned Queen of the Universe it would give me a larger platform to help inspire others to find their purpose as well.

USE OF FUNDS

In order to compete, I need to raise $3000 which is donated to UNESCO. 

THE PERKS

To thank you for your support I'm adding some pretty cool perks! You can get one of these three head shots signed by me for only 25 dollars! You may choose one.
story_txt:
Victoria Cardozo, Miss Argentina 2015, aims to help the world in the Queen of the Universe Charity Pageant to support UNESCO & global educationQueen of the Universe unites the intelligence and beauty of woman around the world in search of the perfect ambassador of love, hope, and peace. The woman crowned "queen" will promote awareness to help the less privileged and will be a great ambassador of humanity and a role model for young women around the world.The Queen of the Universe will promote education for children in need, and for children in third world countries, as well as work with various charities and nonprofits around the world.

The Mission: Queen of the Universe believes that by giving children a good education we empower them to become better human beings and make their dreams into a reality, therefore, making our next generations much stronger and more determined. We believe education is the most important thing you can give someone to better their circumstances.

Charitable Alliance: UNESCO is the United nations Education Science and Cultural Organization. Queen of the Universe highly believes in the UNESCO motto, "Teach a child how to fish, and you'll feed him his entire life."
All funds will go directly to UNESCO!
Now who is Victoria?I'm a Los Angeles based actress who also believes in helping those in need as well. I'm passionate about what I do and I love helping others in anyway I can. I came to become Miss Argentina because both my parents are from Argentina and I become eligible to compete in the Queen of the Universe Pageant.  For the Queen of the Universe pageant, you either have to be born in the country you represent or have blood from it. 
Why do I believe this is important?
I believe we are put on this planet to create, inspire, and help those who are not as fortunate as us. It's important to have human compassion and to try to bring love and encouragement to others in need and to help them find, get and accomplish their own dreams.  If I am crowned Queen of the Universe it would give me a larger platform to help inspire others to find their purpose as well.
USE OF FUNDSIn order to compete, I need to raise $3000 which is donated to UNESCO. THE PERKSTo thank you for your support I'm adding some pretty cool perks! You can get one of these three head shots signed by me for only 25 dollars! You may choose one.

story:
Buy a bricks to build a class room

Dear Friends

BUY A BRICK TO BUILD A CLASSROOM APPEAL

We are humbly requesting donations to build classrooms for our nursery school. 

Children in Key Stages 1 - 3 face many problems when it comes to education because their classrooms are not weather proof and here in Kenya we receive torrential down pours during the rainy season.

So we need your support to buy bricks, corrugated iron sheets, cement, sand and skilled labour to build 3 classrooms for the girls and boys aged 5 - 8 years. 

Our target is $8500 US. One USD purchases 3 bricks.

Please donate as little or as much as you can. Every dollar counts. And every child counts.

Your's

Mwasaha Mwagambo

Manager
+254712941019

Goodsamaritan vision school

story: Joseph is 7 years old. He has autism. For the last three years we - the parents -  have run a home programme called son-rise. It is child led and based on play activities. For this purpose, we trained in America at the Autism Treatment Centre in Massachussets. Joseph has made a lot of progress and our aim is his full recovery. We would like to go to America again with him to attend an intensive programme where we, as parents, receive further individual training and Joseph is in a play-room full-time with trained son-rise facilitators for an entire week. Please, help us to make this dream come true. Help us towards our target of £10.000 with any donations you can make. Every little bit counts!!! You would make an enourmous difference in our son's life!!!

story:
Who I am

Hello Everyone,

My name is Rosa Rodriguez, but you can call me Rose! I am from Honduras, Central America, and I am looking to enroll at a university to study music. I am applying to several of them, as I also look for performing opportunities abroad.  As you may know, scholarships and financial aid are limited for international students, that's why I need you! 

My Love for Music

I have always been in love with music. As a kid, I would sing in choirs, all sorts of cultural events, and even made home-based presentations to family and friends. As I became an adolescent, I sang at talent shows, contests, and at church, which  gave me a sense of purpose and meaning for what I was doing.

My Previous University Studies

When I graduated from High School, I decided to study to be a teacher. I was inspired by wonderful teachers I had met at my job, including my mother, who's passion for teaching was always overflowing. But I was also scared of pursuing music because I was convinced  I should see it only as a hobby.  

My Band

I met my band mates in 2009. We played for the first time at an all-nighter created  by a school to fight hunger in the world. We felt such a connection, it seemed like we had been together for years. I enjoyed making music so much, it gave me the determination to pursue it full time, despite the fear of not making a living out of it. 

We played in all sorts of venues, won a few awards, and got lucky to surprisingly have one of our videos aired in MTV Latin America. I even got a chance to finance my own studies with what I earned playing during my last university year. 

Moment of Truth during my Graduation

During my graduation, I remember they put both our faculty (Pedagogy) with the music faculty in the same room. As they called the students to come get their diplomas, I couldn't help but notice how much I would have loved to be called forward to receive a music degree. I could see the picture in my mind. But a fire inside of me made me think: "It's not too late for you to study what you love most".

After that, I got blessed to have received an opportunity to take private music lessons for a few months in Atlanta, GA. Thanks to people that believed in me. Once the courses were finished, I came back to my country. 

Determination, Inspiration

My eyes were now open, I knew what motivated me most and I realized how much I had to say in music. I could be on the piano for hours and hours and I would feel like I needed nothing else. Music for the soul. I suddenly felt empowered and inspired to give my all to at least try to live and work on music. 

Currently Writing Songs

I am currently working on songs for my band's debut album. The more I work on songs, the more I perform, the more I realize how helpful it is to learn which tools are available out there for me to become a better musician, to develop what I have inside, and to be able to express myself in a more efficient way. I need to study music. If I get to do that, I can tell you I'll be so happy that I could die in peace. 

How can you help? You have two different options:

A. Contribute with any amount you'd like, any amount is welcome, and you can get one of the thank you prizes I put together for you.

B. Be my U.S. Cosigner or help me find a U.S. Cosigner for a supplemental  student aid I am applying to. Contact me for questions. I'll be eternally grateful. 

Estimated Cost of Attendance (Yearly) 

Tuition: $28,600

Books and School Supplies: $6,000

Housing: $6,050

Food: $4,920

Transportation: $1,200

Health Insurance: $1,416

Thank You!

I'll be thankful for life with all of you! Words cannot express how much I appreciate your help. All my family and friends, thank you for your constant support. To all my new friends and people I haven't met yet: nice to meet you and THANK YOU SO MUCH!

My band's web page:

(Currently working on our debut album to be released in 2016)

www.midnightcoffee.band 

My Youtube Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88yDOlCK6Qo

Check out the other videos and pictures I shared on the Gallery! 

Contact me:

rrodriguez.love@gmail.com 


SPANISH TRANSLATION/ TRADUCCIÓN Al ESPAÑOL 


Quien Soy

Hola a todos!

Mi nombre es Rosa Rodriguez, pero me pueden llamar Rose! Soy de Honduras, Centro America y estoy buscando matricularme en una universidad para estudiar Musica.  Mientras aplico a varias universidades, tambien busco oportunidades de conciertos fuera del pais. Como saben, las becas y el apoyo financiero es limitado para los estudiantes internacionales. Es por eso que necesito tu ayuda!  

Mi Amor Por La Música 

Siempre he estado enamorada de la música. Desde niña, cantaba en coros, en todo tipo de eventos culturales y hasta hacia presentaciones en casa para amigos y familiares. Cuando fui adolescente, cantaba en shows de talentos, concursos, y en la iglesia, lo que me dio un sentido de proposito y significado para lo que hacia.  

Mis Estudios Universitarios Previos

Cuando me gradué del colegio, decidí  estudiar para ser maestra. Los maestros increibles que conoci en mi escuela y en mi trabajo despues me inspiraron, incluyendo mi mamá, cuya pasión por la enseñanza era siempre abundante. Tenia miedo de perseguir la música porque estaba convencida de que debia verla  solamente como un pasatiempo.  

Mi Banda

Conoci a mis compañeros de banda en el 2009. Nuestro primer concierto fue en una vigilia creada por una escuela para luchar contra el hambre en el mundo. Sentimos una conexion tan grande, que parecia como que nos conociamos de hace años. Disfrutaba tanto crear musica, que eso me dio la determinacion para perseguirla a tiempo completo, a pesar de la incertidumbre de no poder vivir de ello. 

Tocamos en todo tipo de lugares, ganamos algunos premios, y tuvimos la suerte de que uno de nuestros videos fuera parte de la programacion en MTV Latino America. Gracias a Dios hasta pude financiar mi ultimo año de estudios universitarios con lo que ganaba con los conciertos. 

Pensamiento Durante Mi Graduacion

Recuerdo que en mi graduacion, Nos pusieron en el mismo salon con la facultad de musica. Mientras llamaban a los estudiantes para recibir sus diplomas, note que me hubiera encantado pasar adelante a recibir uno de música. Podia ver la imagen en mi mente. Pero un fuego en mi interior me hizo reflexionar: "Nunca es tarde para estudiar lo que amas". 

Luego de eso, tuve la oportunidad de recibir clases particulares musicales por unos meses en  Atlanta, GA. Gracias a personas que creyeron en mi. Una vez que los cursos terminaron, regrese a mi pais.  

Determinación, Inspiración

Mis ojos estaban ya abiertos, sabia que era lo que mas me motivaba y me di cuenta de cuanto tengo que compartir en la música. Podia estar en el piano por horas sin sentir que necesitaba nada mas. Música para el alma. De repente me senti enpoderada e inspirada para dar todo de mi y decidí por lo menos intentar vivir y trabajar de la música. 

Escribiendo Canciones 

Estoy trabajando en las canciones para el album debut de mi banda. A traves del tiempo he notado que entre mas compongo y  mas presentaciones hago, mas me doy cuenta  cuan util es aprender sobre todas las herramientas que hay disponibles para los musicos. Deseo ser un mejor musico, para desarrollar lo que tengo adentro, para poderme expresar mejor. Necesito estudiar musica, si logro hacer eso, podria morir de tanta paz ahorita.  

Como Pueden Ayudar? Tienen Dos Opciones Diferentes:

A. Contribuir con cualquier cantidad, cada contribucion es importante y bienvenida. Obten uno de los regalos de agradecimiento que arme para ustedes! 

B. Ser mi aval americano o ayudame a encontrar un aval americano para una ayuda financiera estudiantil a la que estoy aplicando. Contactenme para preguntas. Estare eternamente agradecida. 

Costos Estimados Anuales 

Matricula y Cuota anual: $28,600

Libros y Utiles: $6,000

Vivienda: $6,050

Comida: $4,920

Transporte: $1,200

Seguro de Vida: $1,416

Muchísimas gracias! 

Estare agradecida de por vida con todos ustedes! Las palabras no pueden expresar cuanto aprecio tu ayuda. A toda mi familia y amigos, gracias por su apoyo constante. A los amigos nuevos y a las personas que aun no he conocido, es un placer conocerles! Estoy muy agradecida! 

La pagina web de mi banda "Midnight Coffee":

(Trabajando ahorita en nuestro album debut a ser lanzado en el 2016)

www.midnightcoffee.band 

Mi Canal de Youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88yDOlCK6Qo

Chequea los otros videos y fotos que agregue en la galeria de esta campaña!

story:
The First Colombian Solar Radio Interferometer (FiCoSI)

My name is Juan Camilo Guevara, I am a young Colombian scientist interested in solar physics and also in science communication. My country, Colombia, is located near the Amazon rainforest. Because the weather is mostly cloudy, astronomical observations with optical telescopes are challenging. Radio Astronomy seems to be the logical solution to improve our capability for astronomical and astrophysical research, and acquire know-how experience in the development of instrumentation. Furthermore the radio astronomy will allow us to venture in space weather research as well as solar physics research involving topics from particle's acceleration until incidence of solar phenomena in our planet. With this in mind, I designed, built, and implemented with my own budget a radio antenna for solar observation (you can see pictures below). The results have been good despite the low quality of the electronic systems.


Radio Antenna

Spectrum: In the figure we can see the background electromagnetic noise in Bogotá. This has been studied and lets us know which are the available frequencies for the radio astronomical observations.

Now, I want to improve the radio spectrograph to one of higher quality. The goal is to build a two-element solar radio interferometer, with the possibility to add more antennas in the future. This instrument will be the First Colombian Solar Radio Interferometer (FiCoSI), covering frequencies in the range between 100 and 1000 MHz. The instrument will allow the education and training of undergraduate along with master degree students interested in solar radio astronomy and instrument development. High school students will also benefit by making their first steps in scientific research through data analysis and measurement of solar activity.

Once operational, the radio interferometer will carry on daily solar observations, and will ahttps://www.indiegogo.com/campaigns/the-first-colombian... be to pursue some overnight galactic and planetary observations too. All data, images, and products will be available for download to anyone in the internet through an online data archive.

What do we need?

The money from this campaign will be used to buy the electronic data acquisition system, two antennas, the internet domain, and the development of the educational guides and instrument software. Below, there is a detailed description.

1) Hardware of data acquisition system:

  • ROACH 2: Is a board with the electronic components to implement the adquisiton data system. $3000.00 (https://casper.berkeley.edu/wiki/ROACH2)

  • Dual 2.5 GSPS ADC in circuit board with coaxial sma inputs: Is an analog digital converter able to process signal with precision until 1200 MHz. $1200.00

  • Four low noise amplifiers from Minicircuits (http://www.minicircuits.com/MCLStore/ModelInfoDisplay?14509814396360.804871907221796) $80.00 each. TOTAL: $320.00


2) Antennas:

Two log periodic antennas, similar to the antenna in the following link (http://www.martinrfsupply.com/Creative-CLP-5130-1N-Antenna-50-1300-MHz-Log-Periodic_p_878.html) $520.00 each. TOTAL: $1040.00


3) Preparing educational material: $300.00

This material will be prepared in collaboration with undergraduate students of the National University of Colombia,  and high school students of state schools in Bogotá.


The remaining money will be used for miscellaneous materials, shipping, import costs and taxes.


Why Contribute?


Your contribution to this project will help the development of astronomy and astrophysics in Colombia. High school and undergraduate students could have the potential to use this project and learn the basic concepts of physics, astronomy and astrophysics throughout the analysis of data and the development of instrumentation. If built, this will be the first instrument of its class in Colombia, making your contribution crucial for this pioneering project. If you donate $20 or more, you will either receive a personalized postcard with historic images of the first astronomical observatory in Latin America. Or a postcard with astronomical  and solar radio observations made in Colombia.


Another way to help!

Please share and make this project better known and possible!

2) Antennas:Two log periodic antennas, similar to the antenna in the following link (http://www.martinrfsupply.com/Creative-CLP-5130-1N-Antenna-50-1300-MHz-Log-Periodic_p_878.html) $520.00 each. TOTAL: $1040.003) Preparing educational material: $300.00This material will be prepared in collaboration with undergraduate students of the National University of Colombia,  and high school students of state schools in Bogotá.The remaining money will be used for miscellaneous materials, shipping, import costs and taxes.Why Contribute?Your contribution to this project will help the development of astronomy and astrophysics in Colombia. High school and undergraduate students could have the potential to use this project and learn the basic concepts of physics, astronomy and astrophysics throughout the analysis of data and the development of instrumentation. If built, this will be the first instrument of its class in Colombia, making your contribution crucial for this pioneering project. If you donate $20 or more, you will either receive a personalized postcard with historic images of the first astronomical observatory in Latin America. Or a postcard with astronomical  and solar radio observations made in Colombia.Another way to help!Please share and make this project better known and possible!

story:
"Keep Learning, Keep Growing."

Tapia will warm your heart with jokes and laughter after a long day at the office. She will also help keep you that much closer to loved ones who are miles away by taking photos of your happy times together. Additionally, Tapia gives you helpful updates on weather conditions when you are headed out, and can play music when asked to set the mood or help you relax. As a roommate, friend, and daily partner, this robot will stay faithfully by your side and evolve right along with you on life’s journey.


                                         


Smartphone APP "Tapia Link"


Feature 1 : Protecting

When a monitored person hasn’t responded to the communication robot for a certain period of time, she informs the person’s family accordingly. Monitoring from outside the home is available.　She supports a life in which a person living apart from his/her family or a person in single-person household can live at ease.

Monitoring

Activity Recognition and Detection Technology

By vision deep learning,Tapia recognizes activity and abnormal activity in our daily life at home.Then,Tapia will let you know when you probably stay in a dangerous situation

Care Assistant

Tapia helps those living alone enjoy greater personal security and freedom by monitoring when they come and go and contacting family members if they’ve not returned home for a certain period of time.

Feature 2 : Communication

Tapia has an emotion expression system and favorability rating system installed for daily conversation. Responses from her change depending on the pace and the content of your conversation.

Communication

Conversations with Tapia will naturally change and evolve depending on how you speak to her. If you talk with her a lot every day, you will begin to hear new humorous and surprising words.

Feature 3 : Life Support

You can operate Tapia easily by voice and command her to make a phone call, a video call, take a photo, and read a newspaper out loud. She informs you of the time for medication and the weather at the start of the day. In addition, she will become a central aspect of your life as an IoT device for a smart house. (* Now under development)

Video Chat

Personal Assistant

Tapia is also the perfect personal assistant able to place phone calls, provide weather updates, manage your schedule, read you the news, etc., giving you all the perks of having a personal assistant at your disposal 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The built-in SIM slot makes connecting to the Internet a breeze.

Media

Tapia can help you celebrate by taking photos of important memories and playing music when you want to relax, set the mood, or feel like dancing! Tapia is your companion. It’s completely up to you just how to make the most of her!

Language Option

--- English, Chinese, Korean or Japanese ---

You can choose your Tapia's language; English, Chinese, Korean or Japanese when you first set up. (*Caution: You CAN NOT change the language once you set it up.)

Appearance design

The rounded design represents “Wa(harmony)” that characterizes the Japanese spirit. “Wa” stands for compassion for others, kindness, and peaceful relationships. We want Tapia to be your best companion, the one who will always be there with you.

Portable Size

Quick Charging Base

Design Team

Facial Expression


 
Tapia’s big round eyes express all emotions—joy, anger, sorrow, happiness, etc., and she will be there, watching over you any time you need her.



As of May 2016, the development of Tapia's mold and production parts is nearly completed! This means Tapia is going into final test production. Software development is also coming along quite smoothly with plans to provide an SDK for those interested in robot development proceeding according to plan. Our focus during development has and continues to remain putting the best possible product we can on the market, and the rigor of our test procedures and development cycles reflects this.


*MJI’s Software Development Kit (SDK) is currently still under development. Stay tuned, however, as we will be uploading details about the development of the SDK as soon as they are ready to share.

*Please accept our genuine, heart-felt thank you for choosing TAPIA! Because of your kindness and generosity, we can donate $10 of the cost of every unit you order directly to the Japan Red Cross’s 2016 Kumamoto Earthquake Disaster Relief Fund! This makes a huge impact in the lives of those affected by this disaster. We will update you again with more details once your donation has been made to this fund.

http://www.jrc.or.jp/english/

MJI is a Japanese-based company with the slogan, 

MORE JOYFUL INNOVATION.

MJI develops communication robots that color your life, make you smile, and help you relax. MJI’s robots stay beside you as a loyal partner in life.


Every new product launch inevitably involves a certain amount of risk. Understanding this, we have focused ourselves on minimizing these inherent risks by building a team with years of experience in manufacturing and quality control. Here are some of the particular risks our team has identified:

1.Shipping 

As with all Indiegogo campaigns, a possibility of shipping being delayed exists. We are strategically planning and working diligently to avoid such delays, but should they arise despite our best efforts, we will let all backers know as soon as we ourselves know to ensure 100% transparency any shipping issues.

2.Function

As the product is still in development, there is a chance that some of the functionality will be changed in the final version. We are working hard around the clock to finish development as soon as we possibly can. If any changes in functionality arise as we finish development, we will notify all backers immediately and keep them updated.  


3.Strength of product

Our design philosophy is safety first. This means we not only design for safety, but we also carry out highly rigorous manufacturing tests that we perform over and over to ensure it. However, as with any product, there is a limit to what Tapia can stand, and if handled roughly or improperly, she may break.

Thank you so much for your support! We truly hope you love Tapia as much as we do!

Do I need an internet connection?

-Yes. You need an internet connection to communicate with Tapia.

Does Tapia move?

-Tapia can not walk, but she can move vertically and rotate horizontally at 180. You can take her to anywhere you want.

How long does it take to charge Tapia? And how long will it last?

-It takes about 6 hours to full-charge Tapia and the battery will last for about 8 hours.

What does Tapia learn?

-Tapia can learn your lifestyle, such as bedtime, wake-up time, and favorite music and etc.. 

She will turn off the light and say "good night" or "have a good dream", when you go to bed.

Can I update Tapia?

-Yes. It will be automatically updated.

What language does Tapia speak?

-You can choose your Tapia's language; English, Chinese, Korean or Japanese when you first set up. (*Caution: You CAN NOT change the language once you set it up.)

Which countries do you ship Tapia to?

-We provide worldwide shipping. 

How much does shipping cost?

-We charge a standard shipping fee $149 for international shipments. (Shipping fee will be $99 for Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Korea, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, and Indonesia. Shipping fee will be $10 for Japan) Customs, VAT, duties and other charges may apply additionally for international shipments.

story:
Versión en español

Hola, soy Carlota Pereyra Rey, ciclista a todo pedal y actual presidenta de la Asociación de Ciclistas del Perú, organización que promueve el uso de la bicicleta y la movilidad sostenible.  Hoy quiero compartir contigo un sueño, uno que debe convertirse en realidad, pues de otro modo en los próximos años no podremos coexistir pacíficamente en las ciudades.  Te cuento que sueño con ver la transformación de la gente y la humanización de las ciudades, quiero saber que cada uno de los que nos movilizamos sonriamos cada día, quiero que el ruido, el smog y el caos vehicular dejen de ser los agentes más representativos de nuestras ciudades.

Felizmente este sueño es posible, desde que cada año ciclistas del mundo entero nos venimos reuniendo en el Foro Mundial de la Bicicleta, siendo este un espacio donde dialogamos acerca de los problemas que nos aquejan a los usuarios de la bicicleta, y en el que discutimos soluciones viables e innovadoras para construir ciudades sostenibles.

Este año 2016, entre el 31 de marzo y el 5 de abril, desarrollaremos en Santiago de Chile la 5ta versión del Foro Mundial de la Bicicleta, por lo que mi compañera Jeannett Arias Oscanova y yo, como miembros directivos de la Asociación de Ciclistas del Perú, haremos un recorrido de unos  6900 kilómetros entre ida y vuelta, llevando con nosotras un mensaje de esperanza a nombre de nuestro país.  Gran parte de nuestro recorrido de ida lo haremos pedaleando y otro tanto lo haremos en transporte público. 

Creemos que muchos quisieran acudir y participar de este evento tan trascendente y transformador para nuestro planeta, pero no pueden hacerlo por diferentes razones.  Nosotras, Jeannett Arias Oscanova y yo, Carlota Pereyra Rey, les ofrecemos la posibilidad de participar a través nuestro ayudándonos en el viaje y aportando sus ideas y sugerencias para resolver los diferentes problemas que nos aquejan a los ciclistas, en especial a aquellos que circulamos en países donde el tráfico es un verdadero caos. Requerimos tu apoyo para realizar este viaje y para participar activamente en el Foro Mundial de la Bicicleta 2016, donde fortaleceremos nuestras capacidades en favor del uso seguro de la bicicleta en el Perú, y para poder enriquecernos con nuevas ideas en favor de la construcción de ciudades eco-amigables y sostenibles. 


Ayúdanos a difundir nuestra campaña y a generar eco a través tuyo. ¡Gracias!  :D

story:
Short Summary

Midtown Academy is a K-8 Baltimore City Public Charter School right in the heart of Baltimore, Maryland. We serve an amazingly diverse population, as  our mission is "Uniting diverse communities, igniting an enduring passion for learning and developing outstanding global citizens." 

Unfortunately, we have 200 students and only 30 working laptops! In the year 2016, it is just unheard of for a school to be so lacking in technology. To engage students, open their eyes to the world they are in, and give them the experience that other students are getting, we need computers! As a small, effective charter school, we face a funding gap annually that we work to close as a school community.

We have nine classrooms, and one laptop cart. Teachers are struggling daily to share them in order to incorporate technology into their lessons. With another cart, we will be able to have 30 more touch points to the computers. Heck, we could use 8 more carts!

Our students deal with enough adversity in their daily lives, help us give them a leg up by accessing knowledge and experience here in our safe school environment with the help of laptops.


What We Need & What You Get

It's very basic, we have to raise $12,000 to purchase a new cart, loaded with 30 new Lenovo laptop computers that meet Baltimore City School standards. The contributions go directly to funding the cart and computers. Each laptop ends up costing about $350.

Any contributions will go towards more computers, even if we don't reach our goal of a complete cart. Every dollar helps us buy more.

Our perks for contributing come from the hearts of our students and should make you feel very good about helping a public school in Baltimore. We will have everything from handmade cards, framed Baltimore-themed artwork made by the students, photos of the students with the new cart, your name on a laptop, a school visit, and more…


The Impact

We connect our students with the world, helping to see their place in it. We want them to see beyond their neighborhoods, beyond the city, to see their connection and impact on the world! We want them to know they are just as important as everyone else! Computers are a major key to this effort.

The impact is immeasurable! EVERY STUDENT NEEDS COMPUTER TIME! We are in a technology driven society, and our students fall a step behind every day they are not getting experience with computers. Think about it, would you want YOUR child in a school that had no computers?


Experience

As a school, we have successfully completed several campaigns and projects not only to help us, but our community as well. For example, we helped switch 57 households and businesses to wind power, we produced a calendar to support a local urban farm, we've secured grants to have kids travel to the Chesapeake Bay, we've produced a book on immigration featuring friends and families of the school. We built a rain garden, we compost, we've filmed informative environmental videos, we created beautiful sculptures with repurposed bottlecaps, we've planted trees, we've raised chickens, we've hatched butterflies...

Here is a short 3 minute video about our school:



Risks and Challenges

The only challenge is raising enough money to purchase more laptops. Any funds raised will go directly to buying more laptops.


Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE HELP SPREAD THIS MESSAGE! Even if you can't make a donation, perhaps you are connected to someone who can. Are you in with a celebrity? Facebook friends with a CEO? Neighbor a high powered lawyer? Connected to a foundation? Generous corporation? Philanthropic friends or family? Twitter buds with a mover and shaker?

  • We can even accept used laptops if they're not too old.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks a ton. Your generosity is very appreciated!

story:
English Version


 

(Para español click aquí)

AMERICA DIGITAL,  MAKE POSSIBLE THE TECHNOLOGY AND BUSINESS "LINKEDIN" FOR THE AMERICAS.

Online networking and training platform for professionals, entrepreneurs and executives: Innovation, Entrepreneurship, Crowdfunding, Venture Capital, ICTs, Mobile, IoT, e-Commerce, Digital Marketing.

Resumen

During America Digital Crowdfunding Campaign you will get your America Digital Membership under special conditions saving up to 90%, funder member category on the America Digital Network, access to more than 80 specialized conferences from international experts already available on the platform America Digital, contribute to reach 10,000 members and generate a US$1 billion social impact.

Get the Special Perk of the Week 

Contribute with US$ 50  once and get your America Digital Membership FREE FOR EVER (normal price US$ 190 / annually ) + 2 tickets for the next Technology and Business Congress America Digital (Valued in US$ 130 each ticket) + Funder Member Category on your America Digital Profile + Personalized greetings in our social networks. 

INTRODUCTION

We are an organization (we operate with the brands America Digital, Chile Digital) dedicated to networking and training to power your professional development. We organize one of the biggest and most important Tech and Business Congress in the Americas (http://congreso.chile-digital.com/english/ ) connecting and inspiring more than 5000 attendees from 22 countries. The Congress is every two years, the next one is 21-22 June 2017.

Watch video from our Last Congress held in Santiago de Chile, 8-9 July, 2015, Convention Center, Espacio Riesco.


We believe that our region AMERICAS (Canada, USA and emerge Americas: Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Peru, Ecuador, Panama, Costa Rica, Mexico) has problems in Education, Health, Transport, Employment, Housing, Capital Access, Energy, Agriculture/Food, Government/Cities optimization which can be solved with innovative business models, incorporating new ICTs (Big Data, Cloud, Mobile, IoT, e-Commerce, Digital Marketing).  However to effectively incorporate these ICTs and to make them work along with each reality is necessary to networking and training entrepreneurs, government personnel, professionals and executives in Innovation Management, Business Models, Capital Ventures, and Lean and modern Methodologies. Specially, if we consider that professionals in general do not receive this kind of training in universities or during their formal studies. On the other hand, there is a need to be continually updated since changes on these areas are constant and happen very fast.

Therefore and as an extension of the CONGRESS, we have created America Digital www.america-digital.com a Online Platform that allows to connect inspire and train online thousands of professionals, entrepreneurs and Top executives that want to make a change. Innovating in their companies, local governments, creating new companies and new employments. 

We have just finished America Digital platform, Phase I. The platform is available on desktop www.america-digital.com and in Google Play and Apple Store. Search by "America Digital". 

Watch the next video explaining America Digital online platform 


The platform powers your professional development by  connecting you with Top experts, amplifying your networking with professionals  from the Americas, international executives and by training yourself through access to video- conferences of international experts such as:

  • Aleyda Solis (Spain), TOP 10 digital marketing specialist Forbes 2015, International Expert in SEO. Explains a methodology and techniques to positioning your business on top search results on Google. 

  • Inspire with a profound speech about Digital Age, Government and Citizenship by Ricardo Lagos, ex president of Chile.

  • Open the platform to co-creation, so that people like you can contribute with high quality and specialized content. This will require to hire a reviewing and coordination team.

AMERICA DIGITAL, HAS POSIBLE EL "LINKEDIN" DE TECNOLOGÍA Y NEGOCIOS DE LAS AMERICAS. 

AMERICA DIGITAL plataforma online de networking y capacitación para empresarios, profesionales y ejecutivos en Innovación, Emprendimiento, Crowdfunding, Capital de Riesgo, TICs, Mobile, IoT, e-Commerce, Marketing Digital.

RESUMEN

Sólo durante el Crowdfunding podrás obtener tu membrecía América Digital en condiciones especiales ahorrando hasta un 90% en tu membrecía, conectar con ejecutivos de las américas, acceder a las más de 80 conferencias especializadas de expertos internacionales disponibles en la plataforma, ayudar a llegar a 10.000 miembros y generar US $ 1000 millones de impacto social.

INTRODUCCIÓN

Somos una organización (operamos con las marcas AMERICA DIGITAL y CHILE DIGITAL) dedicada a la capacitación y networking para impulsar tu desarrollo profesional. Organizamos uno de los mayores congresos de tecnología y negocios de las AMERICAS (http://congreso.chile-digital.com/ ) conectando e inspirando más de 5000 participantes de 22 países. El Congreso es cada dos años, el siguiente es el 21 y 22 Junio 2017.

Vea el vídeo de nuestro último Congreso celebrado en Santiago de Chile el  8 y  9 Julio 2015, en el centro de convenciones Espacio Riesco.

        

Creemos que nuestra región de las Américas (Canadá, Estados Unidos y América Latina: Argentina, Brasil, Chile, Colombia, Perú, Ecuador, Panamá, Costa Rica, México) tienen problemas en Educación, Salud, Transporte, Empleo, Vivienda, Acceso al Capital, Energía , Agricultura/Alimentación, Gobierno, optimización de recursos en las Ciudades que se pueden resolver con modelos de negocio innovadores, incorporando nuevas áreas disponibles (Big Data, Cloud, Smart Cities, Mobile, Internet de las Cosas (IoT), Comercio electrónico, Marketing Digital). Pero para lograr incorporar esto de manera efectiva en modelos de negocios que funcionen a cada realidad, se requiere capacitar fuertemente a empresarios, funcionarios de gobiernos, profesionales y ejecutivos en las áreas de Gestión de la Innovación, Modelos de Negocios, Capitales de Riesgo, Metodologías Lean y de emprendimiento modernas.  Aún más, considerando que en general  profesionales no reciben educación en estas áreas en universidades o durante sus estudios formales. Por otro lado los cambios en estas áreas son extremadamente rápidos, requiriendo estar actualizado como ejecutivo, profesional o empresario continuamente.

Es así como hemos creado, como una extensión del Congreso, la Plataforma Online AMERICA DIGITAL www.america-digital.com que permite que te puedas conectar, inspirar y capacitar con miles de profesionales, ejecutivos, empresarios y funcionarios de gobierno que trabajan en estas áreas y desean realizar un cambio. Permitiendo Innovar en sus organizaciones, gobiernos locales, crear nuevas empresas y nuevos empleos.

El objetivo de la campaña es US$ 375.000 para mejorar la plataforma America Digital, mejorar el networking  y añadir más contenido de alta calidad. El presupuesto se gastará de la siguiente manera:

Mejorar Networking

Generar contenido de alta calidad:

  • Generar más contenido para cada grupo educativo específico.
  • Contratar personal permanente para la coordinación de contenidos y creación de contenidos.
  • Abrir la plataforma a la co-creación, para que expertos como tú puedan contribuir con contenido especializado. Para ello será necesario contratar a un equipo de profesionales para revisión y coordinación de contenidos.

 Contribute with US$ 500 once and get  your America Digital´s membership FREE FOR EVER  (Valued in US$190/year) + 2 tickets for the conferences  of the Tech & Business Congress America Digital 2017 (Valued in US$560 each ticket) + a special distinction as PLATINUM Funder Member Category in your America Digital profile, this category is forever inside the network + a personalized greeting in our social networks, Facebook, Linkedin and Twitter being recognized as a funder contributor PLATINUM of America Digital. 

 
 Contribute with US$ 1,000 once and get  two America Digital´s membership FREE FOR EVER (Valued in US$190/year) + 2 tickets FULL PASS for Tech & Business Congress America Digital 2017 (Valued in US$1200 each ticket) + Two tickets for the Closing Party of the Congress 2017 + a special distinction as Diamond Funder Member Category in your America Digital profile, this category is forever inside the network + YOUR NAME IN A PHYSICAL WALL  IN OUR OFFICE as a DIAMOND FUNDER/CONTRIBUTOR + a personalized greeting in our social networks, Facebook and Twitter being recognized as a funder contributor DIAMOND of America Digital.





America Digital powers your profesional development, connect and educate thousands of professionals and executives like you that can make the difference. Innovating in their companies, local governments, improving competitiveness of SMEs, creating new innovative companies and new employments. 
                

Your contribution will allow to complete Phase II, inspiring, reaching, connecting and educating over 10,000 executives, professional and entrepreneurs that can produce a social impact of over US$ 1 billion* in the Americas. 
(*Based on the impact that Innovation management, entrepreneusrhip, venture capital access, ICTs, Big Data, e-Commerce, Digital Marketing skills can produce in local government projects, company creation, employment creation, resource optimization in Health, Transport, Agriculture/Food, Education, Energy, Mining). 
America Digital platform is running on desktop, available on Google Play and Apple Store with over 80 conferences available representing more than 200 hours of specialized conferences and more than 500 top executives from Americas are already members. So, in any level of contribution you already can enjoy your America Digital membership and perks.
          
Our Goal of US$375,000 will allow at least duplicate the content and reach 10,000 members, if we raise more money, we will increase the content and improvement of America Digital platform, increase more members. If we raise less money, we will adjust the main activities  to the budget available. 

Your contribution from US$ 5 to US$ 1,000 or more  is welcome, we believe in education as engine of change, you can contribute having an active profile and generating relevant content in Red America Digital, sending this campaign link www.america-digital.com  to professionals in the areas of #Innovation, #Venture Capital, #Crowdfunding, #Entrepreneurship, #ICTs, #Big Data, #Mobile, #eCommerce, #Digital Marketing #indiegogo,  and promoting America Digital´s Crowdfunding campaign using Indiegogo´s Tools. 
Connect in our social networks and Spread the word with the  following social posts using the #americadigital #indiegogo
 POST 1: Be part of #americadigital crowdfunding on #indiegogo, power your networking and produce a US$ 1 billion social impact http://igg.me/at/america-digital 


POST 2:  Power your career, networking being part of #AmericaDigital #Innovation #entrepreneurship #inspiration #socialimpact http://igg.me/at/america-digital 






 

 
 

 







Versión Español


 
 



(For English click here)

AMERICA DIGITAL, HAS POSIBLE EL "LINKEDIN" DE TECNOLOGÍA Y NEGOCIOS DE LAS AMERICAS. 
AMERICA DIGITAL plataforma online de networking y capacitación para empresarios, profesionales y ejecutivos en Innovación, Emprendimiento, Crowdfunding, Capital de Riesgo, TICs, Mobile, IoT, e-Commerce, Marketing Digital.

RESUMEN
Sólo durante el Crowdfunding
podrás obtener tu membrecía América Digital en condiciones especiales ahorrando
hasta un 90% en tu membrecía, conectar con ejecutivos de las américas, acceder
a las más de 80 conferencias especializadas de expertos internacionales disponibles
en la plataforma, ayudar a llegar a 10.000 miembros y generar US $ 1000
millones de impacto social. 
RECOMPENSA ESPECIAL DE LA SEMANA
Contribuye esta semana con US$50 una vez y recibe tu
membrecía America Digital por siempre (precio normal de US $190 / año) + 2
entradas para la Expo del próximo Congreso Latinoamericano de Tecnología y Negocios
America Digital ( Precio normal cada entrada US$ 130) + Categoría de Miembro
Fundador en tu Membrecía America Digital + saludos personalizados en nuestras
redes sociales. 
INTRODUCCIÓN
Somos una organización (operamos con las marcas AMERICA DIGITAL y CHILE DIGITAL) dedicada a la capacitación y networking para impulsar tu desarrollo profesional. Organizamos uno de los mayores congresos de tecnología y negocios de las AMERICAS (http://congreso.chile-digital.com/  ) conectando e inspirando más de 5000 participantes de 22 países. El Congreso es cada dos años, el siguiente es el 21 y 22 Junio 2017. 
Vea el vídeo de nuestro último Congreso celebrado en Santiago de Chile el  8 y  9 Julio 2015, en el centro de convenciones Espacio Riesco.
        

Creemos que nuestra región de las
            Américas (Canadá, Estados Unidos y América Latina: Argentina, Brasil, Chile, Colombia, Perú, Ecuador, Panamá, Costa Rica, México) tienen problemas en Educación, Salud, Transporte, Empleo,
Vivienda, Acceso al Capital, Energía , Agricultura/Alimentación, Gobierno, optimización
de recursos en las Ciudades que se pueden resolver con modelos de negocio innovadores, incorporando nuevas áreas disponibles (Big Data, Cloud, Smart
Cities, Mobile, Internet de las Cosas (IoT), Comercio electrónico, Marketing
Digital). Pero para lograr incorporar esto de manera efectiva en modelos de negocios que funcionen a cada realidad, se requiere capacitar fuertemente a empresarios, funcionarios de gobiernos, profesionales y ejecutivos en las áreas de Gestión de la Innovación, Modelos de Negocios, Capitales de Riesgo, Metodologías Lean y de emprendimiento modernas.  Aún más, considerando que en general  profesionales no reciben educación en estas áreas en universidades o durante sus estudios formales. Por otro lado los cambios en estas áreas son extremadamente rápidos, requiriendo estar actualizado como ejecutivo, profesional o empresario continuamente.
Es así como hemos creado, como una extensión del Congreso, la Plataforma Online AMERICA DIGITAL www.america-digital.com que permite que te puedas conectar,
inspirar y capacitar con miles de profesionales, ejecutivos, empresarios y
funcionarios de gobierno que trabajan en estas áreas y desean realizar un
cambio. Permitiendo Innovar en sus organizaciones, gobiernos locales, crear nuevas empresas y nuevos empleos.

Acabamos de terminar FASE I de la plataforma AMERICA DIGITAL, la cual está disponible en www.america-digital.com en Google Play y Apple Store, búscala por "America Digital".
Vea el siguiente video que explica la plataforma AMERICA DIGITAL
            







 
        Con la plataforma AMERICA DIGITAL potencias tu desarrollo profesional, amplías tu networking conectando con ejecutivos TOP de las Americas, asistentes a los Congresos de Tecnología y Negocios 2013-2015 y accedes a cientos de horas de conferencias especializadas tales como:


Aleyda Solis (España), TOP 10 especialista en marketing digital  Forbes 2015, experta internacional en SEO, explica  metodología y técnicas para posicionar tu negocio en los primeros lugares de Google.  
Inspírate con un profundo discurso sobre la Era Digital, Gobierno y Ciudadanía de Ricardo Lagos, ex presidente de Chile. 
Aprende sobre la Gestión de Redes Ángeles y Levantamiento de Capital con VCs junto a Ron Weissman
(EE.UU.), Presidente de “Band of Angels” la red Ángel más antigua de Silicon Valley y socio de APAX uno de los principales VCs y firmas de capital privado. 
Tendencias móviles con David Hyman (EE.UU.), Google. 
Aprende cómo aplicar Analítica Web para incrementar tus ventas con Gemma Muñoz (España), autora de "El arte de medir" y "Analítica web en una semana". 
Y accede a más de 80 conferencias y 200 horas de conferencias de los principales expertos ya disponibles en Bitcoins, Crowdfunding, Big Data, Big Data Marketing, Social Media para empresas, CLOUD, CRMs/ERPs, IoT,  Smart Cities, Movilidad Empresarial, e-Commerce, Marketing Digital, Capital de Riesgo, Gestión de la Innovación y más.


El objetivo de la campaña es US$ 375.000 para mejorar la plataforma America Digital, mejorar el networking  y añadir más contenido de alta calidad. El presupuesto se gastará de la siguiente manera:
Mejorar Plataforma:

Contratar diseñadores y mejorar el diseño.
Mejorar Hosting, UX/UI.
Creación de un área de soporte técnico a los miembros.

Mejorar Networking

Comunicación y marketing para construir una comunidad de más de 10.000 miembros en la Fase II.

Generar contenido de alta calidad:

Generar más video-conferencias y seminarios en línea de alta calidad con contenido especializado.
Generar más contenido para cada grupo educativo específico.
Contratar personal permanente para la coordinación de contenidos y creación de contenidos.
Abrir la plataforma a la co-creación, para que expertos como tú puedan contribuir con contenido especializado. Para ello será necesario contratar a un equipo de profesionales para revisión y coordinación de contenidos.


El valor actual de la Membrecía en AMERICA DIGITAL ver www.america-digital.com es US $
190 / año, sólo durante esta campaña de crowdfunding podrás acceder a descuentos especiales y exclusivos para obtener tu membrecía America Digital y obtener una distinción especial como miembro fundador de America Digital.

 PERK ESPECIAL DURANTE LANZAMIENTO, SOLO PARA LOS PRIMEROS 5 DÍAS y LIMITADO A 20 CONTRIBUIDORES.  
    AMERICA DIGITAL ESPECIAL Contribuye con US $ 150 (sólo disponible si contribuyes DURANTE LOS PRIMEROS 5 DÍAS DE CAMPAÑA y limitado a 20 contribuyentes) y obtén tu membrecía AMERICA DIGITAL GRATIS PARA SIEMPRE (Valorado en US $ 190 / año) + 1 boleto para las conferencias del Congreso Latinoamericano de Tecnología y Negocios a realizarse en Santiago de Chile del 21-22 Junio 2017 (valorado en US $ 560) + Categoría de Miembro Fundador AAA en tu perfil en America Digital dentro de la red por siempre + un saludo personalizado en nuestra redes sociales
    
    
    



 
 
 



 



 America Digital´s Platinum

 
 America Digital´s Diamond



 Contribuye con  US $ 500 una vez y obtén tu membrecía America Digital  GRATIS POR SIEMPRE (Valorizado en US $ 190 / año) + 2 entradas para las conferencias del Congreso Latinoamericano Tecnología y Negocios 2017 (valorizado en US $ 560 cada entrada)+ Categoría de Miembro Fundador Platinum en tu perfil en America Digital dentro de la red por siempre el nombre de nuestros colaboradores PLATINUM) + un saludo personalizado en nuestras redes sociales, Facebook, Linkedin y Twitter siendo reconocido como un financiador categoría PLATINUM en America Digital.

 
 Contribuye con US $ 1.000 una vez y obtienes dos membrecías AMERICA DIGITAL GRATIS PARA SIEMPRE (Valorado en US $ 190 / año) + 2 entradas FULL PASS con acceso a todas las actividades (Expo, Rueda Negocios, Conferencias y Venture Capital Forum) que se realizan dentro del próximo Congreso Latinoamericano de Tecnología y Negocios 21 y 22 Junio 2017 (valorado en US$ 1200 cada entrada) + 2 entradas fiesta clausura Congreso+ Categoría de Miembro Fundador DIAMOND en tu perfil en America Digital dentro de la red por siempre+ TU NOMBRE EN UN MURAL FÍSICO EN NUESTRA OFICINA como MIEMBRO FUNDADOR DIAMOND + un saludo personalizado en nuestras redes sociales, Facebook y Twitter reconociéndote como un Miembro Fundador Diamond.





AMERICA DIGITAL te permite conectar con empresarios, profesionales, funcionarios de gobierno y ejecutivos que desean realizar un cambio y acceder a cientos de horas de conferencias especializadas de expertos internacionales que potencian tu desarrollo profesional. Permitiéndoles a los miembros de America Digital Innovar en sus organizaciones, gobiernos locales, crear nuevas empresas de alto impacto y nuevos empleos. 
Tu contribución permitirá completar la Fase II, conectar, inspirar y capacitar a más de 10.000 ejecutivos, profesionales y empresarios que puedan producir un impacto social de más de US $ 1 billón* en las Américas.
(* Basado en el impacto que la transferencia de habilidades en gestión de la innovación, emprendimiento, Desarrollo de Venture Capitals, TICs, Big Data, IoT, e-Commerce, marketing digital puede producir en los proyectos del gobierno local, creación de empresas, creación de empleo, Optimización de recursos en las Ciudades, Salud, Transporte, Agricultura / Alimentación, Educación, Energía, Minería).

Así que, en cualquier nivel de la contribución YA PUEDES DISFRUTAR DE LAS
CONFERENCIAS DISPONIBLES Y EL NETWORKING CON EJECUTIVOS DE LAS AMERICAS. 
Nuestra meta de US $ 375,000 permitirá al menos duplicar el contenido y conectar 10.000 miembros, si recaudamos más dinero durante el Crowdfunding, vamos a aumentar el contenido y la mejora de la plataforma America Digital, aumentar la cantidad de miembros. Si recaudamos menos dinero, ajustaremos las actividades al presupuesto disponible. 
DE TODOS MODOS EN CUALQUIER CIRCUNSTANCIA ACCEDERÁS A TU
MEMBRECÍA AMERICA DIGITAL EN CONDICIONES ESPECIALES SÓLO DISPONIBLE DURANTE EL
CROWDFUNDING. 

Tu contribución desde US $ 5 a US$ 1.000 es bienvenida, creemos en la educación como motor de cambio, que puedes contribuir con tu perfil activo en America Digital, promover el networking dentro de la red y generar contenido relevante en America Digital.
También puedes colaborar difundiendo el link de la campaña de Crowdfunding America Digital

story:
Hi . My name is Jennie Collins I would like to give a short story about the above School. I live in Glasgow, Scotland. Originally I come from Kikuyu Division, in Kiambu District in Kenya’s Central Province.  The schools name is Kandengwa Primary. I taught in this school for almost twenty years before I relocated to United Kingdom with my family.This school was built within an Agricultural research institute in Kenya known as KARI. It was an institute primary School built  for the  children of the staff there. It was among the best schools in the country because it was taken care of by the institute. 

Unfortunately later in mid eighties the senior staff felt they wanted to take their children out of Kandengwa as the population had increased and the standard was going down. The teachers were not able to cope with the large numbers of pupils with class sizes of 50 to 60. This was too large for teachers to be able to manage no matter how good they were. So now Kandengwa was left as a school for the poor and the junior staff who were even struggling to keep their children fed.  The parents could no longer keep up with the maintenance of the school so both teachers and children were left with no help at all and the school has deteriorated since then. 

All my 5 children went to this school and recently my son visited Kenya and decided to go and visit his school. They use to love it and have good memories of school and being brought up there. Sadly when he went he took pictures of the school and sent them to me. I was so sad when I saw the condition of the school.We have put together a short slide show. People will observe that a lot of the recent pictures of the school have been taken out side. This is because the interior of the school, where the teaching takes place, is not in good condition at all.

 I feel very sorry for the children and the teachers in that school as this is not a conducive learning environment. Even the buildings are a hazard to those children as the walls are cracked and there is not a single window pane. The built-in blackboards on the walls are also cracked, same as the floors and the roofs are leaking. I am now appealing to the all those people who would like to help support this community through improving the education of children to help rebuild this school. I am also appealing to the Kandengwa Old Students and Teachers Facebook Group, to help their school as it made them to be what they are today.

 In order to do this I am setting up this crowd funding appeal and will be asking former pupils, their families and anyone else who cares enough to help us. I am in contact with the school authorities and a committee will be formed to make arrangements to project manage the rebuilding work. If  successful we will try to bring an innovation which most of us take for granted. We will get the school connected to the power grid and they will have electricity for the very first time.

We have set a target of £15,000. This will be used to buy building materials to fix the roof, walls, floors and windows. As you can see from the pictures a complete rebuild is required for most of the buildings. It is intended to replace 8 classes using local builders and have these buildings connected to an electricity supply which the school has already brought close to the site.They only need to get it distributed. 

We will take pictures and share progress with you. I have family and former pupils who are in Kenya and are forming a building committee to project manage the work. I know people will want to see that this is properly monitored. If we do not achieve our full goal we will donate any funds to the school for books or other learning materials.Through local contacts and family members we will ensure financial monitoring and good governance is followed.

This school is almost falling down and the immediate benefit is a safer learning environment!If it falls down the pupils will have no place to learn. This school serves some of the poorest families in rural Kenya. Transportation is a problem and the next nearest school is over 5 miles away cross country. We are aware of similar projects that draw on the networks of former pupils and teachers to rally around a former school they have fond memories of. This campaign is also about community development in rural Africa and we know once it succeeds it will assist families to step out of poverty through the education of  their children.

As Kenyans we are used to working through committees to plan community projects and family events such weddings and funerals.This system of organisation is still thriving today and it is a good vehicle for this project to be delivered efficiently as opposed to leaving it in the hands of one or two individuals. The school head teacher and the school committee have been contacted and are fully supportive of this campaign however they do not have resources to commit other than their time as they are struggling to keep the school open as it is. As a former teacher I am aware of the needs of pupils in rural Kenya. You may think communication is a problem but it may surprise people to know that Kenya has one of the best telecommunications systems in the world and I am in touch with people every day.Communication is actually very easy.

We appreciate any financial donation you can make to help rebuild this rural school. We would also be very grateful if you would simply share this campaign with all your networks using the Indiegogo sharing tools. This would help us to spread the word. In our video clip you will see a small girl asking -if it is possible? Let's do this and make this happen. Thank you.

story:
Humans learn skills and proceed to use those skills each day. 

Unfortunately, common practice of conventional education teaches

skill acquisition but doesn't teach skill use. Many children struggle with the latter, 

and as a result are high risk for behavior problems. The ACTION REACTION® center

addresses this missing piece, enabling children to receive the skill use

instruction they need and deserve. Through hands-on, interactive, brain-based

materials, children learn the framework for skill use / skilled reactions.
